mapper.sql: id, name, subTitle, orignalPrice, promotePrice, stock, cid, createDate
mapper.insert: insert into product (id, name, subTitle, orignalPrice, promotePrice, stock, cid, createDate) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orignalprice,jdbcType=REAL}, #{promoteprice,jdbcType=REAL}, #{stock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into product
id,
name,

orignalPrice,

stock,

createDate,

mapper.update:
update product
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
subTitle = #{subtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
orignalPrice = #{orignalprice,jdbcType=REAL},
promotePrice = #{promoteprice,jdbcType=REAL},
stock = #{stock,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cid = #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createDate = #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
